name: Can You Make It?
description:
A game made in 24 hours on Playjam 2. I think it’s a lot of fun, but adjust your expectations ;-)


What’s that about?

You need to crank it! Stop being lazy and max your productivity! Can you make it to the end? Don’t even think about docking that crank before that congratulatory level finished screen! And then? Dock your crank! Hurry!

  • There’s no escape, the cycle just repeats
  • Remember the pattern and follow my lead
  • Every frame counts! 
  • If you miss, you lose a life
  • You gain a life after each level

Share your high score in the comments!


Feedback wanted <3

If you play the game and have any ideas, let me know! If you want to know a bit more about its 12 hours of development, read my launch devlog.
